Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Enable admins to set default document library label based on container label of a group/site/team
Description:
This enables admins to inherit document library label from the container label of a group/site/team. New and edited documents within the default document library will be labeled automatically. If the SharePoint admin had already configured a default document library labeling, this setting will not override it. #copilotcontrolsystem
GA date: June CY2026
Preview date: June CY2025
